title: Hizamazuite Ai ni Kogarero
sinopse:
A collection of five one-shots...with a common theme of learning to accept one's true feelings for another, and making a plea for love against anxious misgivings....

1-3. On My Knees, Yearning for Your Love 4. Feverish 5. Can’t Win Against the Sun! 6. Seduction of Cinderella 7. Anata no Chef
